job_description: Account Assistant (Only Female) : The Hormone Lab & Infertility Centre Jobs ENG বাংলা Create Account Sign In For Employer Create Sign In Home Jobs Mybdjobs Job List The Hormone Lab & Infertility Centre Account Assistant (Only Female) Application Deadline : 08 Mar 2026 Apply Now Shortlist Share: Facebook LinkedIn WhatsApp All Requirements Responsibilities Skills & Expertise Salary & Benefits Company Information Summary Vacancy: 1 Location: Dhaka (Mohammadpur) Salary: Tk. 10000 - 15000 (Monthly) Experience: At most 1 year Published: 06 Feb 2026 To access Application Insights Get Bdjobs Pro Requirements Education HSC in Commerce Bachelor/Honors Bachelor of Business Administration (BBA) in Accounting Experience At most 1 year The applicants should have experience in the following business area(s): Diagnostic Centre Freshers are also encouraged to apply. Additional Requirements Yearly 16 Extra Paid Leave Duty Time: 10 AM - 07 PM Joining Date: 01 April 2026 *** We believe in first come first service *** One year experience in relative field is an asset Responsibilities & Context Perform daily data entry in accounting software or Excel as instructed. Maintain and update client information, payment status records, and follow-up logs accurately. Assist in preparing bills, invoices, receipts, and other documents as per guidance. Call clients to remind pending payments and update remarks accordingly. Coordinate with marketing or collection executives regarding client payment follow-ups. File and organize bills, invoices, vouchers, and other paperwork systematically. Assist in photocopying, scanning, and printing documents for accounts and administration. Support senior accountants in basic documentation and data management tasks. Maintain confidentiality of financial and client information. Perform any other clerical or support tasks assigned by the accounts or admin department. Skills & Expertise Accounting Compensation & Other Benefits Salary Review: Yearly Festival Bonus: 2 Workplace Work at office Employment Status Full Time Gender Only females are allowed to apply. Job Location Dhaka (Mohammadpur) Company Information The Hormone Lab & Infertility Centre Follow More jobs from this company Address: 21/F 2nd Floor, Bashbari Main Road, Mohammadia Housing, Mohammadpur, Dhaka Website: https://hormonelab.org/ Report this Job / Company (রিপোর্ট) রিপোর্ট এই চাকরির জন্য বিজ্ঞাপনদাতা ব্যাক্তি/প্রতিষ্ঠান আপনার কাছ থেকে কোন অর্থ চাইলে কিংবা নিয়োগ প্রক্রিয়া চলাকালীন কোন প্রকার হয়রানিমূলক (শারীরিক/মানসিক) আচরণ করলে অতিসত্ত্বর আমাদেরকে জানান অথবা জবটি রিপোর্ট করুন। চাকরি পাওয়ার জন্য কোন ব্যাক্তি/প্রতিষ্ঠানকে অর্থ প্রদান করবেন না। চাকরিকালীন কোন প্রকার হয়রানির (শারীরিক/মানসিক) সম্ভাবনা থাকলে সেখানে জয়েন করবেন না। কোন প্রকার অর্থ লেনদেন বা নিয়োগদাতা কর্তৃক হয়রানির দায়িত্ব বিডিজবস বহন করবে না। 09638666444 , 01897627858 complain@bdjobs.com ⏸ Project Cycle Management (PCM) for the NGO Professionals 4500 BDT Tareq Ahmed Register Now Lean Six Sigma-Yellow Belt 3500 BDT Engr.

NOC Support Engineer : Shunno IT Jobs ENG বাংলা Create Account Sign In For Employer Create Sign In Home Jobs Mybdjobs Job List Shunno IT NOC Support Engineer Application Deadline : 16 Feb 2026 Apply Now Shortlist Share: Facebook LinkedIn WhatsApp All Requirements Responsibilities Skills & Expertise Salary & Benefits Company Information Summary Vacancy: 2 Age: 22 to 32 years Location: Rajshahi Salary: Tk. 15000 - 30000 (Monthly) Experience: At least 2 years Published: 06 Feb 2026 Applicants are encouraged to submit Video CV. To access Application Insights Get Bdjobs Pro Requirements Education Bachelor/Honors Diploma MTCNA, MTCRE, or equivalent networking qualifications are highly preferred. Experience At least 2 years The applicants should have experience in the following business area(s): Business-to-Business (B2B) Software and Services Startup, ISP, IT Enabled Service, Software Company Additional Requirements Age 22 to 32 years To be considered for this role, candidates must possess:Proven expertise in MikroTik Router OS and advanced router configurations.Strong understanding of OLT systems, PON technology, and fiber network management.Hands-on experience with API and Radius integration.Familiarity with VLANs and routing protocols (e.g., OSPF, BGP).Ability to design and implement load balancing and high-availability solutions.Proficiency in network monitoring tools.Relevant certifications like MTCNA, MTCRE, or equivalent networking qualifications are highly preferred. Responsibilities & Context Our Company is looking for Two NOC Support Engineers to join our team. MikroTik Configuration & Management: Complete setup and management of MikroTik routers. Advanced VPN configuration and maintenance. PPPoE, static IP assignments, and hotspot configuration. Firewall rules creation, NAT configuration, and traffic shaping. Advanced scripting and automation for MikroTik. OLT Configuration & Support: Bringing OLT devices online and integrating them with the network. Configuring VLANs and managing PON (Passive Optical Network) ports. Monitoring and troubleshooting fiber connections and ensuring minimal downtime. Knowledge of ONU/ONT provisioning and firmware updates. API and Software Integration: Integrating software with MikroTik using API and Radius protocols. Troubleshooting issues between the billing platform and the network infrastructure. Network Monitoring & Troubleshooting: Real-time monitoring of network performance using NMS tools like The Dude, Zabbix, or similar platforms. Diagnosing and resolving network-related issues, including latency, packet loss, and device misconfigurations. Maintaining documentation for all configurations and troubleshooting procedures. Provide ongoing support and communication to customers. Preparing regular incident reports. Skills & Expertise CCNA (Cisco Certified Network Associate) GPON ISP ISP operation Mikrotik Administration MTCNA MTCRE OLT and ONU Compensation & Other Benefits Performance bonus Salary Review: Year

To access Application Insights Get Bdjobs Pro Requirements Education Bachelor/Honors Minimum Bachelor Degree Experience At least 5 years The applicants should have experience in the following business area(s): Banks Additional Requirements Minimum 5 years` experience, including 2 years mandatory experience in RMD/Basel/Credit or Treasury. Excellent verbal and written communication skills both in Bangla and English Excellent analytical skills Responsibilities & Context Functional Role: Risk Analyst (Bond Investment), RBS Desk, Operational Risk Analyst, Research & Policy Development, BASEL Desk & PCA Desk Designation: PO-SPO Key Accountabilities Issuance of Sub-Ordinated Bond (Approval & Regulatory Compliance) Analyzing & identifying Market Risk, Operational Risk, Monitoring the implementation of Basel III across the bank Calculating & Raising the required Capital under Tier-2 Analyzing, Evaluating & Preparing proposal for investment in Tier-2 Bonds and Mutual Funds Monitoring the indicators of PCA Framework and identify early warning signals Assessing the Risks under PCA and taking appropriate steps for risk mitigation Developing the Recovery Plan of the Bank Collecting & Coordinating with related Divisions and Providing Information/Data for RBS, Present Reports to the Management & Coordinate with Bangladesh Bank on RBS progress, emerging risk and conduct assessment of inherent risk Arrange periodic meeting with the RBS Coordination Committee & Central Bank, Implementing & monitoring the Key Risk Indicator (KRI) Identifying the vulnerable areas related to operational risk Assisting in managing risks related to lapses in people, process and system Monitoring unsettled issues (identified fraud/forgeries, major irregularities etc.) through ICC Monitoring compliance of observations of Bangladesh Bank Developing, testing, and using different models (Collection scoring, Vintage curve etc.) for measuring/assessing risks Reviewing effectiveness of enterprise-wide risk governance framework and recommending necessary policy measures Conducting research to explore reasons behind concurrence of the identified risks Assisting senior management in formulating strategic planning considering bank`s risk exposures and industry as a whole. Preparing a consolidated Risk Appetite Statement (RAS) Calculating & Analyzing the ICAAP report under Basel III Skills & Expertise Suggested by Risk Management Regulatory Compliance Banks & Financial Recovery Employment Status Full Time Job Location Anywhere in Banglad

job_title: Backend / Full-Stack Python Developer (AI Systems, Azure/AWS)
job_description: Backend / Full-Stack Python Developer (AI Systems, Azure/AWS) : Async Software Jobs ENG বাংলা Create Account Sign In For Employer Create Sign In Home Jobs Mybdjobs Job List Async Software Backend / Full-Stack Python Developer (AI Systems, Azure/AWS) Application Deadline : 13 Feb 2026 Apply Now Shortlist Share: Facebook LinkedIn WhatsApp All Requirements Responsibilities Company Information Summary Vacancy: 2 Age: 24 to 29 years Location: Anywhere in Bangladesh Experience: At least 1 year Published: 06 Feb 2026 To access Application Insights Get Bdjobs Pro Requirements Education Bachelor/Honors Experience At least 1 year Additional Requirements Age 24 to 29 years Python FastAPI AWS PostgreSQL LangChain Machine Learning Streamlit ReactNext.js GitHub Responsibilities & Context We are hiring two developers to work on AI-powered backend services and system infrastructure, with some frontend integration work. This role focuses on building, improving, and maintaining production systems — not research or theory work. Responsibilities: Develop and maintain Python backend services Build APIs using FastAPI Work with PostgreSQL databases Support AI/LLM pipelines using LangChain Propose AI conepts and Models Improve system performance, fix bottlenecks, and optimise speed Implement caching and load balancing where needed Support deployments, environments, and pipelines Contribute across backend, middleware, and integration tasks Assist with frontend integration using React or Next.js when needed Build or maintain internal tools and dashboards using Streamlit Required Skills: Strong Python backend experience AWS experience (EC2, S3, RDS or similar) PostgreSQL FastAPI LangChain or LLM-based application experience Understanding of machine learning in practical applications Experience with Streamlit Experience with React or Next.js GitHub and version control workflows Experience with deployment and production environments Bonus (not required): Jira or other task management tools Docker or container experience Requirements: Must have a portfolio or GitHub showing previous work Experience working with production systems is important Ability to troubleshoot performance and scaling issues Comfortable working across backend and integration tasks Good communication skills We are looking for committed team members who take ownership and follow tasks through to completion Contract & Budget: This is a 3–6 month contract role with the possibility of extension based on performance and project needs. We are working within a tight startup budget , so applicants are asked to include their salary expectations when applying. This role suits developers looking for consistent project involvement and responsibility, rather than short-term gig work. Workplace Work from home Employment Status Contractual Job Location Anywhere in Bangladesh Company Information Async Software Follow Address: SW1 London Business: Growing SAAS, AI , Mobile Software business Report this Job / Company (রিপো
